Articles.Content:
It does not allow me to enter a password, and it looks a bit strange: 

No 1.0 for me so far. 

![pokqRXU.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/pokqRXU.jpg)
It hasn't loaded for you, try clearing your cache and restarting your browser ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It should look like this if it loads:

![6hAMYzG.png](http://i.imgur.com/6hAMYzG.png)

The link to the store in the top menu of the forum points to an incorrect url [https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/kspstore/](https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/kspstore/)

I found the correct url, it's working now.

It's a DNS issue apparently, clearing the DNS cache in your browser (see your browser docs for details) should resolve it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> It's a DNS issue apparently,

Maybe next time when Squad decides to move their server they can take that into account

> 
> clearing the DNS cache in your browser (see your browser docs for details) should resolve it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I had already done that to. And as i had communicated to you in my previous reply, the issue was already resolved. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Sorry, there's been so many of these they got confusing ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
